summary.para: The CRYPT_PROVIDER_REGDEFUSAGE structure is used by the function to register callback information about a provider's default usage.
Size, in bytes, of this structure.
GUID that specifies the provider's default action.
Pointer to the name of the provider DLL.

Pointer to the name of the function that loads the callback data to be returned when the function is called with the dwAction parameter set to DWACTION_ALLOCANDFILL. This information also exists in the structure.
Pointer to the name of the function that frees allocated memory when the function is called with the dwAction parameter set to DWACTION_FREE. This information also exists in the structure.
